uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.fileIO

Class CodeExport

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.fileIO.CodeExport

  • public class CodeExport
extends Object
    Exports Java code to file using data retrieved from all ClassDiagData & RelationshipDiagData objects stored in VectorOfDrawables.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (slj11), Craig Heptinstall (crh13)

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • printOut

        public void printOut(String filePath,
            int varNo,
            int opNo,
            int asocNo,
            String className,
            ArrayList<String> varArray,
            ArrayList<String> opArray,
            ArrayList<String> asocArray)
              throws Exception
        Obtains selected directory path for file export before retrieving all class and relationship data and converting into Java code using string manipulation and concatination. Java code is then saved as '.java' files in user specified directory.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - File path for .java files selected by user using dialog
        varNo - - Number of variables in classes to convert/output as Java code
        opNo - - Number of methods in classes to convert/output as Java code
        asocNo - - Number of associated variables used for relationships to convert/output as Java code
        className - - The name of each class to be exported (Used in .java' filename)
        varArray - - ArrayList of all variables in each class to be exported
        opArray - - ArrayList of all methods in each class to be exported
        asocArray - - ArrayList of all associated variables in each class to be exported
        Throws:
        Exception - - IO/FileNotFound exceptions that are thrown and dealt with by CanvasPanel
